message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $140. It's in excellent condition and worth more than what I'm asking. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $130 is closer, I'm still hoping to get closer to my original asking price. Would you be willing to go up to $135? It's a fair price for a great product.
I understand your position, but I'm still trying to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $132? That's the highest I'm comfortable going.
